thread.title: Illegal Immigrant in San Francisco Killing Sentenced to Time Served on Weapons Charge

author: Zusha Elinson
title: Illegal Immigrant in San Francisco Killing Sentenced to Time Served on Weapons Charge
text:
SAN FRANCISCO—A judge sentenced an undocumented Mexican national acquitted of murder in the death of a San Francisco woman to three years in state prison, after he was convicted of illegally possessing a gun.
But Juan Ines Garcia Zarate, whose case generated national attention, won’t spend more time in state prison because of credit for time he’s already served, according to law-enforcement officials.
